name: This Dungeon is Pretty Dark
description:
The Dungeon is Pretty Dark is a roguelike game that i made for my undergraduate thesis.

It's pretty simple: 2 kind of class, 4 kind of enemy, 4 kind of potion, and a lot of dark dungeon.

Use [W,A,S,D] to move, [1, 2, 3, 4] to drink potion, [F] to wait for one turn, and [Q] to unleash your special attack.

After you have played the game, please fill this survey https://forms.gle/hBU8b2Yh3LJQij7x9 because you know... I need it to graduate.
